DOC.brief_summary: The study hypothesis investigate whether moderate weight loss ( i.e . weight reduction least 5 % ) could improve response rate suboptimal dose cyclosporine patient severe psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: Moderate Weight Loss Makes Obese Patients With Severe Chronic Plaque Psoriasis Responsive Sub-Optimal Dose Cyclosporine : Investigator Blinded , Controlled , Randomized Clinical Trial
